DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events form the McAfee Sidewinder Firewall (Versions 6.1+).

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: NamingAccess: dns_proxy, t_attack, Invalid DNS message
ApplicationTrafficAudit: telnet proxy, ssh server, t_attack 1
ApplicationTrafficAudit: telnet proxy, ssh server, t_attack 2
FileTransferTrafficAudit: ftp proxy, t_attack, ftp command

FastPattern.pattern: fac=f_kernel,area=\w+,type=t_attack,.+?,reason="[^"]*This may be an attempt to disrupt TCP connections.+
